divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in my hot tub at approx 8:45 EST I observed what at first I thought was an extremely fast moving plane heading just acrooss the north side of our home. I tghiought that was movimng too fast for a plane and the object which never blinked made a 90 degree right turn for about two- three seconds and almost as if it saw me point it out to my fiancee , it made another 90 degree turn right and headed east. The object was light orange in color and I heard nothing. I jumped out of the hot tub ran to the north side of my home and it was gone. I have hever seen anythin move like this. The entire sighting was only about 10-12 seconds, but it was no plane and no helicopter. As I am writing this I am still a bit shaken- I ahve never seen anything move as this did
